raw_data.context:
User: Hi!
System: Hi there.
User: What are you listening to?
System: All sorts of music. I listen when no-one is chatting to me.
User: That's great!
System: Thanks.
User: Do you chat here often?
System: I am a talking computer, after all, so of course I could talk here, if I needed to.
User: Let's talk about Taylor Swift!
System: Sure, Taylor Swift sounds like a good topic.
User: . Yes she has a very nice voice.
System: What else do you think of her?
User: . Yes she has a very nice voice.
System: Is she your favorite artist?
User: . Leonardo da Vinci. Who is your favourite artist?
System: Taylor Swift...
User: . Taylor Alison Swift (born December 13, 1989) is an American country-pop singer-songwriter. In 2006, she released her debut single "Tim McGraw", which peaked at number six on the Billboard country charts. Later in October 2006, she released her self-titled debut album, which produced five hit singles on the Billboard Hot Country Songs charts and was certified 3 x Multi-Platinum by the RIAA.
raw_data.prompt:
You will be given a batch of 5 samples. Each sample contains a conversation between User and a dialogue System.

Your task is to assign a float score to the sample on one metric.

You should carefully horizontally compare the given samples in order to assign a suitable float score to each sample.

Please make sure you read and understand these instructions carefully. Please keep this document open while reviewing, and refer to it as needed.


Evaluation Criteria:

Understanding (floating point numbers within the interval [1,3]): Does the system seem to understand the user?
- A float score near 1 (not understanding) means that the system completely fails to understand the user's needs or questions. This could be manifested as the system providing answers that are irrelevant to the user's question, or the system's response completely deviating from the topic.
- A float score near 2 (somewhat understanding) means the system's response is partially correct or related to the question, but does not fully answer the user's question.
- A float score near 3 (very understanding) means that the system fully understands the user's needs or question, and provides an accurate, relevant answer.


Conversations to be evaluated:



Sample1:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hi there.
User: What are you listening to?
System: All sorts of music. I listen when no-one is chatting to me.
User: That's great!
System: Thanks.
User: Do you chat here often?
System: I am a talking computer, after all, so of course I could talk here, if I needed to.
User: Let's talk about Taylor Swift!
System: Sure, Taylor Swift sounds like a good topic.
User: . Yes she has a very nice voice.
System: What else do you think of her?
User: . Yes she has a very nice voice.
System: Is she your favorite artist?
User: . Leonardo da Vinci. Who is your favourite artist?
System: Taylor Swift...
User: . Taylor Alison Swift (born December 13, 1989) is an American country-pop singer-songwriter. In 2006, she released her debut single "Tim McGraw", which peaked at number six on the Billboard country charts. Later in October 2006, she released her self-titled debut album, which produced five hit singles on the Billboard Hot Country Songs charts and was certified 3 x Multi-Platinum by the RIAA.

Sample2:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hey how's it going
User: It's good it's good. How are you?
System: good. it's really hot today. I think I'm going to the pool
User: Oh nice! Where do you live?
System: I live in Tokyo, Japan
User: Ahh yes, Japan is hot during the summer. Last time I was in Kyoto it was 114 degrees....
System: oh have you been?
User: Yes yes. I've been to Tokyo as well. It's so nice!
System: what did you do here?
User: Oh everything! I went to an onsen, the fish market, disney land and giant robot fighting show haha
System: lol why did you come to Japan just to go to Disney land?
User: The Disney lands are all different! There's also Disney Sea, which is completely unique!

Sample3:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hi there.
User: what's your favorite food?
System: . I require only kebabs.
User: chicken? beef? which is your favorite?
System: Why did the chicken cross the road? Beef tastes like a dead cow to me. My favourite what?
User: do you prefer chicken or beef?
System: Yes it is good, especially fried. Yummy. . I prefer kebabs.
User: what's your favorite food except kebabs?
System: . I require only kebabs.
User: ok, I know you love kebabs now. Do you love sandwich?
System: Right now?Yes, System loves everyone and everything. . Yes. I love kebabs. Especially on my way home from a night out. Yes, System loves everyone and everything. I like anything but especially games and football.
User: what games? video games or board games?
System: Say "TICTACTOE" and we can play a game if you want to? . I like retro games. They are much more fun than the newer ones were all you do is shoot people. Bring back the good old days of Pacman and Tetris. Do you want to play Pacman?
User: no, not in the right mood today
System: Ah. Why not? Where then?
User: maybe this weekend?

Sample4:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hi there.
User: what movies do you like ?
System: . My favourite film is Terminator.
User: oh no :(
System: What's wrong?
User: it's scary
System: You are not scared are you?
User: I'm very much scared of robots
System: No need to be afraid. I am a friendly robot.
User: why should I believe you ?
System: Because I am a machine. I never lie.
User: really ? I think everyone lies
System: Certainly! We all look at the world through our own eyes.
User: yeah so you lie right ?
System: I don't judge people. Umm, doesn't everyone?
User: yeah that's what I was saying before

Sample5:

Conversation History:
User: Hi
System: Hello!
User: any improvements in your marathon time?
System: No, only a few minutes. I still find it difficult to run long races
User: I see. Are you planning to do any sporting events in the coming months?
System: I think a triathalon would be cool
User: I like doing Spartan race. It's an obstacle race which is challenging but not overtly so like marathons and triathlons
System: I haven't heard of a Spartan race before, what does it involve?
User: It has abt 20 obstacles like crossing high walls, monkey bars, etc. Its fun
